test-case.name: fn-node-name-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to empty sequence.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a comment node.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to an element node query from a file.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to directly constructed element node.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a comment node.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a processing instruction node.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a directly constructed element node with namespace declaration.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed element node with no namespace declaration and no children.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed element node with no namespace declaration and no children. Used as argument to namespace-uri-from-QName.

test-case.name: fn-node-name-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed element node with no namespace declaration and one child. Used as argument to local-name-from-QName.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed attribute node with value set to empty string. Used as argument to local-name-from-QName.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed attribute node with value set to a non empty value. Used as argument to local-name-from-QName.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "node-name" function with argument set to a computed constructed attribute node with value set to a non empty value. Used as argument to namespace-uri-from-QName.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNameFunc-1
test-case.description: node-name() must be passed one argument, it doesn't use the context item by default.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNameFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `node-name((), "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNameFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(node-name(()))`.
